merge.mappingError: Merge file mapping error, changes reverted
merge.keyError: Merge file key error, changes reverted

errors.invalidUrl: Invalid profile URL. Please enter a URL starting with http:// or https://

notifications.importRetry: Import failed, retrying with Clash proxy...
notifications.importFail: Import failed even with Clash proxy
notifications.importNeedsRefresh: Profile imported but may need manual refresh
notifications.importSuccess: Profile imported successfully, please restart if not visible
notifications.switchInterrupted: Profile switch interrupted by new selection

tooltips.showLast: Click to show last update time

notifications.creationRetry: Profile creation failed, retrying with Clash proxy...
notifications.creationSuccess: Profile creation succeeded with Clash proxy

chain.instruction: Click nodes in order to add to proxy chain
chain.minimumNodes: Chain proxy requires at least 2 nodes
chain.minimumNodesHint: Chain proxy requires at least 2 nodes. Please add one more node.
chain.connectFailed: Failed to connect to proxy chain
chain.disconnectFailed: Failed to disconnect from proxy chain
chain.duplicateNode: Proxy node already exists in chain

status.systemProxyEnabled: System proxy is enabled, your applications will access the network through the proxy
status.systemProxyDisabled: System proxy is disabled, it is recommended for most users to turn on this option
status.tunModeServiceRequired: TUN mode requires service mode, please install the service first
status.tunModeEnabled: TUN mode is enabled, applications will access the network through the virtual network card
status.tunModeDisabled: TUN mode is disabled, suitable for special applications

tooltips.tunMode: TUN mode can take over all application traffic, suitable for special applications that do not follow the system proxy settings

tooltips.autoLaunchAdmin: Administrator mode may not support auto launch

descriptions.rule: Automatically choose proxies according to the rule set.
descriptions.global: Forward all network requests through the selected proxy.
descriptions.direct: Bypass the proxy and connect to the internet directly.

tooltips.autoLaunchAdmin: Administrator mode may not support auto launch

tunMode.autoDisabled: TUN Mode automatically disabled due to service unavailable
tunMode.autoDisableFailed: Failed to disable TUN Mode automatically

tooltips.tunUnavailable: TUN requires Service Mode or Admin Mode

tooltips.hoverNavigator: Automatically scroll to the corresponding proxy group when hovering over alphabet letters
tooltips.hoverNavigatorDelay: Delay before auto scrolling when hovering, in milliseconds

tooltips.autoEnter: Enable to automatically activate LightWeight Mode after the window is closed for a period of time

messages.autoEnterHint: When closing the window, LightWeight Mode will be automatically activated after {{n}} minutes

fields.info: Backups are stored locally in the application data directory. Use the list below to restore or delete backups.

tooltips.dnsHijack: Please use , to separate multiple DNS servers

dialog.title: DNS Overwrite
dialog.warning: If you are not familiar with these settings, please do not modify them and keep DNS Overwrite enabled

useHosts.label: Use Hosts
useHosts.description: Enable to resolve hosts through hosts file

useSystemHosts.label: Use System Hosts
useSystemHosts.description: Enable to resolve hosts through system hosts file

defaultNameserver.label: Default Nameserver
defaultNameserver.description: Default DNS servers used to resolve DNS servers

nameserver.label: Nameserver
nameserver.description: List of DNS servers, comma separated

fallback.label: Fallback
fallback.description: List of fallback DNS servers, comma separated

proxy.label: Proxy Server Nameserver
proxy.description: DNS servers for proxy node domain resolution

directNameserver.label: Direct Nameserver
directNameserver.description: DNS servers for direct exit domain resolution, supports 'system' keyword, comma separated

fakeIpFilter.label: Fake IP Filter
fakeIpFilter.description: Domains that skip fake IP resolution, comma separated

nameserverPolicy.label: Nameserver Policy
nameserverPolicy.description: Domain-specific DNS server, multiple servers separated by semicolons, format: domain=server1;server2

fallbackIpCidr.label: Fallback IP CIDR
fallbackIpCidr.description: IP CIDRs not using fallback servers, comma separated

fallbackDomain.label: Fallback Domain
fallbackDomain.description: Domains using fallback servers, comma separated

hosts.label: Hosts
hosts.description: Custom domain to IP or domain mapping
